# Calling out to someone

## Introduction

When directly addressing soneone in Arabic and calling out to him by name, the particle [يَا]{.ar} is usually prefixed to the person's name. For example,

[ٱَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ يَا زَيْدُ.]{.ar}  
[EassalAmu ealaykum yA zaydu.]{.trn}  
"Peace be upon you, O Zayd."
